column2: an A.M. Eatery////This is probably the best breakfast brunch place in Houston. The wait is always long but I'd say it was worth are 2 hour wait any day. We had a large party and got to try lots of food. Everything tasted sooo yummy. Service and food were both 5 stars!! We had Megan as our server and she was friendly
column3: outgoing and overall exceptional! I'd ask for her! Don't be discouraged by the wait it's well worth it! You never know you might get the special surprise! Enjoy!
